name: Dexscreener to Notion
description: ðŸ¦‰ Import current price of a chart in a notion database

NOTION_SECRET.description: A secret key for access to Notion API.

NOTION_DATABASES.description: A strigified array of all the IDs of your Notion databases.

NOTION_VALUE_KEY.description: The key of the value column.

NOTION_URL_KEY.description: The key of the dexscreener link column of type URL.

CRON_DELAY.description: The delay in minutes between each digit update (by default 30). If the value is equal to 0, the app will be executed once
